LanguageData.VIF.AllowsHaulInDesc: Allows colonists to haul in storage on this vehicle's map.
LanguageData.VIF.AllowsHaulOutDesc: Allows colonists to haul out storage on this vehicle's map.
LanguageData.VIF.VIF.IncreasePriorityDesc: Increase all storage priorities on this vehicle's map
LanguageData.VIF.DecreasePriorityDesc: Decrease all storage priorities on this vehicle's map
LanguageData.VIF.AutoGetOffDesc: Colonists who have nothing to do on the vehicle map will automatically get off this vehicle's map.
